Posts.Content: Dec 9, 2012 03:20PM ChewySpree wrote: Djustme, I had a hematoma that developed on my left side the night after my bmx surgery (11/29). Luckily I was still in the hospital and the nurses worked all night to keep my drains from clogging and to change the bandages around my drain sites. The next morning the surgeon checked me and said he would make a decision to operate again or not around Noon, and when he came to check me at Noon, some of my swelling had started to subside and my drains were still working correctly, so I was able to come home.  The drain on that side has continued to work overtime ever since, and I have been diligent about making sure that it doesn't get clogged. The fluid in that drain has turned much darker red instead of getting clearer over time, as it normally should. When I saw the surgeon last week, he said that was because it was draining the hematoma and that it was old blood and okay.  I'm so sorry you're having to go through this! It sounds like yours is much worse than mine. I hope you get some relief soon.
